manifestDefaults.description: Default values for Kubernetes resource kinds. Extend this section to include defaults for any arbitrary kind (e.g., Deployment, Service, ConfigMap, etc.).

^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$.description: Defaults for a specific Kubernetes resource kind.

manifests.description: A flat map of manifests keyed by a unique identifier. The key is used as the resource name if metadata.name is not provided. Users should define only the manifests they wish to deploy.

^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$.description: Manifest definition as a partial Kubernetes manifest. It will be merged with defaults based on the resource kind.

manifestList.description: A list of manifests. If metadata.name is not provided, a generated name (e.g. manifest-0, manifest-1, etc.) will be assigned.

items.description: Manifest definition as a partial Kubernetes manifest. It will be merged with defaults based on the resource kind.
